text: Anna Medical College is a college in Mauritius, It is currently affiliated with University of Technology, Mauritius. It is located in Montagne Blanche, South-East of the Island and offers only the MBBS program (Bachelor of Medicine, Bachelor of Surgery). ==Accreditations== Anna Medical College is listed with following agencies: *Tertiary Education Commission, Mauritius *World Federation for Medical Education & Foundation for Advancement of International Medical Education and Research *Medical Council of India ==References== Category:Medical schools in Mauritius
title: Anna Medical College
